articles.title: T20 Blast: Edgbaston to host Blast Off double-header to launch 2023 competition - BBC
articles.description: Birmingham Bears, Yorkshire, Derbyshire and Lancashire will take part in a Blast Off double-header to open the 2023 T20 competition.
articles.content:
Hampshire won the 2022 T20 Blast in a thrilling last-ball finish against Lancashire Lightning at Edgbaston
